chapter.title: Roles
chapter.para: The rel="roles" link obtained from the entry point URI (see ) provides access to a static set of system roles. Each individual role element contains the following:

note.title: Element property icons
note.para: The icons used in the properties column of this table are described in

row.entry: A link to the sub-collection for role permits.
Defines the ability to update or delete the role. Roles with mutable set to false are roles built into the Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization environment.

example.title: An XML representation of the roles collection
example.screen: <roles> <role id="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001" href="/restapi-definition/roles/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001"> <name>SuperUser</name> <description>Roles management administrator</description> <link rel="permits" href="/restapi-definition/roles/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001/permits"/> <mutable>false</mutable> <administrative>true</administrative> </role> <role id="00000000-0000-0000-0001-000000000001" href="/restapi-definition/roles/00000000-0000-0000-0001-000000000001"> <name>RHEVMUser</name> <description>RHEVM user</description> <link rel="permits" href="/restapi-definition/roles/00000000-0000-0000-0001-000000000001/permits"/> <mutable>false</mutable> <administrative>false</administrative> </role> <role id="00000000-0000-0000-0001-000000000002" href="/restapi-definition/roles/00000000-0000-0000-0001-000000000002"> <name>RHEVMPowerUser</name> <description>RHEVM power user</description> <link rel="permits" href="/restapi-definition/roles/00000000-0000-0000-0001-000000000002/permits"/> <mutable>false</mutable> <administrative>false</administrative> </role> </roles>

chapter.para: Creation of a role requires values for name, administrative and a list of initial permits. See for more information.

example.title: Creating a role
example.screen:
POST /restapi-definition/roles HTTP/1.1 Accept: application/xml Content-type: application/xml
<role> <name>RoleA</name> <administrative>true</administrative> <permits> <permit id="1"/> </permits> </role>

chapter.para: The name, description and administrative elements are updatable post-creation. See for more information.

example.title: Updating a role
example.screen:
PUT /restapi-definition/roles/8de42ad7-f307-408b-80e8-9d28b85adfd7 HTTP/1.1 Accept: application/xml Content-type: application/xml
<role> <name>RoleB</name> <description>Standard users in Role B</description> <administrative>false</administrative> </role>

chapter.para: Removal of a role requires a DELETE request.

section.title: Permits Sub-Collection
section.para: Each role contains a set of allowable actions, or permits, which the API lists in capabilities. For more information on access to permits, see .
A role's permits are listed as a sub-collection:

example.title: Listing a role's permits
example.screen:
GET /restapi-definition/roles/b67dfbe2-0dbc-41e4-86d3-a2fbef02cfa9/permits HTTP/1.1 Accept: application/xml
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Type: application/xml
<permits> <permit id="1" href="/restapi-definition/roles/b67dfbe2-0dbc-41e4-86d3-a2fbef02cfa9/permits/1"> <name>CREATE_VM</name> <administrative>false</administrative> <role id="b67dfbe2-0dbc-41e4-86d3-a2fbef02cfa9" href="/restapi-definition/roles/b67dfbe2-0dbc-41e4-86d3-a2fbef02cfa9"/> </permit> <permit id="4" href="/restapi-definition/roles/b67dfbe2-0dbc-41e4-86d3-a2fbef02cfa9/permits/4"> <name>VM_BASIC_OPERATIONS</name> <administrative>false</administrative> <role id="b67dfbe2-0dbc-41e4-86d3-a2fbef02cfa9" href="/restapi-definition/roles/b67dfbe2-0dbc-41e4-86d3-a2fbef02cfa9"/> </permit> </permits>

section.para: Assign a permit to a role with a POST request to the permits sub-collection. Use either an id attribute or a name element to specify the permit to assign.

example.title: Assign a permit to a role
example.screen:
POST /restapi-definition/roles/b67dfbe2-0dbc-41e4-86d3-a2fbef02cfa9/permits HTTP/1.1 Accept: application/xml
<permit id="1"/>
HTTP/1.1 201 Created Content-Type: application/xml
<permits> <permit id="1" href="/restapi-definition/roles/b67dfbe2-0dbc-41e4-86d3-a2fbef02cfa9/permits/1"> <name>CREATE_VM</name> <administrative>false</administrative> <role id="b67dfbe2-0dbc-41e4-86d3-a2fbef02cfa9" href="/restapi-definition/roles/b67dfbe2-0dbc-41e4-86d3-a2fbef02cfa9"/> </permit> </permits>
